about_the_game:
This is a bold and challenging pixel style top-down shooting game, where players will transform into a naked boy and shoot security guards in an artistic campus, challenging their reaction speed and strategy.

The game contains a lot of interesting content:

An exciting combat system that utilizes various techniques and strategies to engage in confrontation, defeat enemies, and achieve victory.

Unique storyline, interwoven with thrilling battles, where players can not only engage in a barrage of challenges but also engage in dialogue with NPCs to drive the story forward.

Exquisite visual effects, exquisite pixel style restore the unique scenery of the campus, immersive visual design, bringing a full sense of immersion!

Attention: This game contains adult content and mild violent scenes, and is only suitable for players aged 18 and above.

content_descriptors.notes: It is an adult-oriented action-adventure game in which players take control of a naked character and fight against security guards in the schoolyard. The game contains adult content, involves an explicit element, and is only suitable for players over the age of 18, so please make sure you play in the right environment.

short_description: It's a pixel-style third-person top-down shooter in which players take on the role of a naked boy and challenge the authority of campus security by shooting in an artsy schoolyard. The game is presented in a humorous style, and it unfolds an absurd campus adventure in a challenging and fun campus!
